rules.name: Aircraft
rules.description: May only use Advance actions, moving in a straight line, and adding 30" to its total move (even if Shaken). Aircraft ignore all units and terrain when moving and stopping, can't seize objectives, can't be charged, and units targeting them get -12" range and -1 to hit. Note that whilst Aircraft models are flying above their ground, their base doesn't block movement or line of sight, and units may move and shoot under them (only the actual model is used for purposes of blocking movement and line of sight). Aircraft can't move into the table edges to move less than 30", and their mandatory move doesn't break the staying idle requirement to stop being Shaken.

rules.name: Ambush
rules.description: May be set aside before deployment. At the start of any round after the first, may be deployed anywhere over 9" away from enemy units. Players alternate in placing Ambushers, starting with the player that activates next. Units that deploy via Ambush can't seize or contest objectives on the round they deploy.

rules.name: AP
rules.description: Targets get -X to Defense rolls when blocking hits from weapons with this special rule.

rules.name: Artillery
rules.description: May only use Hold actions. When this model shoots at enemies over 9" away, it gets +1 to hit rolls. When enemy units shoot at this model from over 9" away, they get -2 to hit rolls.

rules.name: Bane
rules.description: Ignores Regeneration, and when attacking the target must re-roll unmodified Defense results of 6.

rules.name: Banner
rules.description: This model and its unit get +1 to morale test rolls.

rules.name: Blast
rules.description: Ignores cover, and after resolving other special rules, each hit is multiplied by X, where X is up to as many hits as models in the target unit.

rules.name: Caster
rules.description: Gets X spell tokens at the start of each round, but can't hold more than 6 tokens at once. At any point before attacking, spend as many tokens as the spell's value to try casting one or more spells (only one try per spell). Roll one die, on 4+ resolve the effect on a target in line of sight. Models within 18" in line of sight of the caster's unit may spend any number of spell tokens at the same time before rolling, to give the caster +1/-1 to the roll per token. Note that Casters get spell tokens each round even if they are not on the table (waiting to Ambush for example), and that the Caster's spells must be picked from their own faction.

rules.name: Counter
rules.description: Strikes first with this weapon when charged, and the charging unit gets -1 total Impact rolls per model with Counter.

rules.name: Deadly
rules.description: Assign each wound to one model, and multiply it by X. Hits from Deadly must be resolved first, and these wounds don't carry over to other models if the original target is killed.

rules.name: Entrenched
rules.description: Enemies get -2 to hit when shooting at models with this special rule from over 9" away, as long as the Entrenched model hasn't moved since the beginning of its last activation.

rules.name: Fast
rules.description: Models with this special rule move +2" when using Advance and +4" when using Rush/Charge.

rules.name: Fear
rules.description: This model counts as having dealt +X wounds when checking who won melee.

rules.name: Fearless
rules.description: Whenever a unit where most models have this rule fails a morale test, roll one die. On a 4+ it counts as passed instead.

rules.name: Flying
rules.description: Models with this special rule may move through units and terrain, and ignore terrain effects whilst moving.

rules.name: Furious
rules.description: When charging, unmodified rolls of 6 to hit in melee deal one extra hit (only the original hit counts as a 6 for special rules).

rules.name: Hero
rules.description: Heroes with up to Tough(6) may deploy as part of one multi-model unit without another Hero. The hero may take morale tests on behalf of the unit, but must use the unit's Defense until all other models have been killed. Note that when a Hero joins a unit, they count as part of that unit, so the unit's size is increased by 1, and even if the hero is the last model remaining, it takes morale tests as the unit. This also means that a hero may never leave its unit or join another one.

rules.name: Immobile
rules.description: Models with this special rule may only use Hold actions.

rules.name: Impact
rules.description: Roll X dice when attacking after charging, unless fatigued. For each 2+ the target takes one hit.

rules.name: Indirect
rules.description: Gets -1 to hit rolls when shooting after moving. May target enemies that are not in line of sight as if in line of sight, and ignores cover from sight obstructions.

rules.name: Limited
rules.description: Weapons with this rule may only be used once per game.

rules.name: Morale
rules.description: Gets +X to morale test rolls.

rules.name: Musician
rules.description: This model and its unit moves +1" when using move actions.

rules.name: Regeneration
rules.description: When taking a wound, roll one die. On a 5+ it is ignored.

rules.name: Relentless
rules.description: When this model uses a Hold action and shoots, unmodified rolls of 6 to hit deal one extra hit (only the original hit counts as a 6 for special rules).

rules.name: Reliable
rules.description: Models attacks at Quality 2+ with this weapon. Note that Reliable only changes the Quality value, so the roll can still be modified, Fatigue still applies, etc.

rules.name: Rending
rules.description: This weapon ignores Regeneration, and unmodified rolls of 6 to hit get AP(4).

rules.name: Scout
rules.description: May be set aside before deployment. After all other units are deployed, must be deployed and may then be placed anywhere within 12" of their position. Players alternate in placing Scout units, starting with the player that activates next.

rules.name: Slow
rules.description: Models with this special rule move -2" when using Advance, and -4" when using Rush/Charge.

rules.name: Sniper REMOVE
rules.description: Shoots at Quality 2+, and each model with Sniper may pick any model in the target unit as its individual target, which is resolved as if it was a unit of 1. Sniper shooting must be resolved before other weapons.

rules.name: Stealth
rules.description: Enemies get -1 to hit rolls when shooting at units where all models have this rule from over 9" away.

rules.name: Strider
rules.description: May ignore the effects of difficult terrain when moving.

rules.name: Takedown
rules.description: This model may pick any model in the target unit as its individual target, which is resolved as if it was a unit of [1]. Takedown attacks must be resolved before other weapons.

rules.name: Thrust
rules.description: When charging, gets +1 to hit rolls and AP(+1) in melee.

rules.name: Tough
rules.description: This model must take X wounds before being killed. If a model with tough joins a unit without it, then it is removed last when the unit takes wounds. Note that you must continue to put wounds on the tough model with most wounds in the unit until it is killed, before starting to put them on the next tough model (heroes must be assigned wounds last).

rules.name: Transport
rules.description: May transport up to X models or Heroes with up to Tough(6), and non-Heroes with up to Tough(3) which occupy 3 spaces each. Transports may deploy with units inside, and units may enter/exit by using any move action, but must stay fully within 6" of it when exiting. When a transport is destroyed, units inside must take a dangerous terrain test, are Shaken, and must be placed fully within 6" of the transport before removal. Note that units inside Transports are deployed at the same time as the Transport, and units can't both embark/disembark as part of the same activation. Units inside/outside of Transports don't have line of sight to the outside/inside, so they can't target each other for shooting, spells, etc. (but units inside can target other units inside, and the Transport itself). Units may use Charge actions to disembark, and they ignore the 1" move restriction when embarking (only one model needs to reach the Transport for everyone to embark).

rules.name: Unstoppable
rules.description: Ignores Regeneration, and ignores all negative modifiers to this weapon.

rules.name: Lock-On
rules.description: Ignores cover and all negative modifiers to hit rolls and range.

rules.name: Lance
rules.description: When charging, gets +1 to hit rolls and AP(+1) in melee.

rules.name: Poison
rules.description: This weapon ignores Regeneration, and the target must re-roll unmodified Defense rolls of 6 when blocking hits. Note that a die roll may only be re-rolled once, so if another 6 is rolled after re-rolling Defense, then the hit is blocked.

traits.name: Suppressor
traits.description: Enemies that are shot at by the hero get -1 to hit when shooting until the end of the round.

traits.name: Blinded Eye
traits.description: Gets -1 to rolls when shooting.

traits.name: Natural Talent
traits.description: The hero recovers and gets +1 XP.

traits.name: Fast Learner
traits.description: May pick any other trait from the list.

traits.name: Bitter Rivalry
traits.description: Gets +1 to hit against enemy heroes.

traits.name: Agile
traits.description: Moves +1" on advance and +2” on rush and charge.

traits.name: Berserker
traits.description: Enemies get -1 to morale test rolls when in melee with the hero.

traits.name: Tactician
traits.description: Friendly units that activate within 6" of the Hero get +1 to hit when shooting.

traits.name: Duellist
traits.description: Enemy units get -1 in melee against the hero.

traits.name: Mastermind
traits.description: Enemy units within 6" of the Hero get -1 Defense.

traits.name: Climber
traits.description: The hero ignores difficult terrain effects.

traits.name: Hunter
traits.description: The hero may shoot even after rush actions.

traits.name: Leader
traits.description: Friendly units within 6" of the Hero get +1 to morale test rolls.

traits.name: Arm Injury
traits.description: Gets -1 to rolls when in melee.

traits.name: Destroyer
traits.description: The hero gets AP(+1) when shooting.

traits.name: Traumatized
traits.description: Gets -1 to rolls when taking morale tests.

traits.name: Runner
traits.description: The hero always moves +2" (even in terrain).

traits.name: Chest Wound
traits.description: Gets -1 to rolls when blocking hits.

traits.name: Prowler
traits.description: Enemy units further than 12" get -1 to hit rolls when shooting at the hero.

traits.name: Specialist
traits.description: Gets +1 to hit rolls in melee or shooting (pick one).

traits.name: Chemist
traits.description: Friendly units within 6" of the Hero get +1 to morale tests when in melee.

traits.name: Warden
traits.description: When the hero is activated all friendly units within 6" of the hero stop being shaken.

traits.name: Motivated
traits.description: Always passes the first morale test of the match.

traits.name: Resilient
traits.description: Gets +1 to rolls when blocking hits.

traits.name: Fanatic
traits.description: The hero gets +1 attack when in melee.

traits.name: Vanguard
traits.description: Friendly units that activate within 6" move +4” when using Charge actions.

traits.name: Herbalist
traits.description: Friendly units within 6" may ignore wounds on a roll of 6+.

traits.name: Headstrong
traits.description: Gets +1 to rolls when taking morale tests.

traits.name: Elite
traits.description: May re-roll one roll of any kind once per game.

traits.name: Crazed
traits.description: Gets +1 attack in melee when charging.

traits.name: Instigator
traits.description: Friendly units that activate within 6" of the Hero get +1 to hit when in melee.

traits.name: Toughened
traits.description: Gets Tough(+1).

traits.name: Scavenger
traits.description: Friendly units that activate within 6" of the Hero get +6” range when shooting.

traits.name: Dead
traits.description: Remove the hero from your army sheet.

traits.name: Smashed Leg
traits.description: Moves -1" on advance and -2” on rush and charge actions.

traits.name: Horrible Scars
traits.description: Enemy units get -1 to hit when in melee against the hero.

rules.description: May only use Advance actions, moving in a straight line, and adding 30” to its total move (even if Shaken). Aircraft ignore all units and terrain when moving and stopping, can’t seize or contest objectives, can’t be charged, and units targeting them get -12” range.

rules.description: This model and its unit moves +1" when using move actions.

rules.name: Regeneration
rules.description: When a unit where all models have this rule takes wounds, roll one die for each. On a 5+ it is ignored.

rules.name: Relentless
rules.description: When this model shoots at enemies over 9" away, unmodified results of 6 to hit deal 1 extra hit (only the original hit counts as a 6 for special rules).

rules.name: Reliable
rules.description: Attacks at Quality 2+.

rules.name: Rending
rules.description: Ignores Regeneration, and on unmodified results of 6 to hit, those hits get AP(+4).

rules.name: Scout
rules.description: May be set aside before deployment. After all other units are deployed, may be deployed anywhere fully within 12” of their deployment zone. Players alternate in placing Scout units, starting with the player that activates next.

rules.name: Slow
rules.description: Moves -2" when using Advance, and -4” when using Rush/Charge.

rules.name: Sniper REMOVE
rules.description: Shoots at Quality 2+, and each model with Sniper may pick any model in the target unit as its individual target, which is resolved as if it was a unit of 1. Sniper shooting must be resolved before other weapons.

rules.name: Stealth
rules.description: When units where all models have this rule are shot from over 9" away, enemy units get -1 to hit rolls.

rules.name: Strider
rules.description: May ignore the effects of difficult terrain when moving.

rules.name: Takedown
rules.description: This model may pick any model in the target unit as its individual target, which is resolved as if it was a unit of [1]. Takedown attacks must be resolved before other weapons.

rules.name: Thrust
rules.description: When charging, gets +1 to hit rolls and AP(+1) in melee.

rules.name: Tough
rules.description: This model must take X wounds before being killed. If a model with tough joins a unit without it, then it is removed last when the unit takes wounds. You must continue to put wounds on the tough model with most wounds in the unit until it is killed, before starting to put them on the next tough model (heroes must be assigned wounds last, even if already wounded).

rules.name: Transport
rules.description: May transport up to X models or Heroes with up to Tough(6), and non-Heroes with up to Tough(3) which occupy 3 spaces each. Transports may deploy with units inside, and units may enter/exit by using any move action, but must stay fully within 6" of it when exiting. Units inside/outside transports may not target other units outside/inside transports, but may target the transport itself. When a transport is destroyed, units inside must take a dangerous terrain test, are Shaken, and must be placed fully within 6” of the transport before it’s removed.

rules.name: Unstoppable
rules.description: Ignores Regeneration, and ignores all negative modifiers to this weapon.
